thread.title: Ovechkin to miss Tuesday's game vs. San Jose
thread.title_full: Ovechkin to miss Tuesday's game vs. San Jose

title: Ovechkin to miss Tuesday's game vs. San Jose
text:
Ovechkin to miss Tuesday's game vs. San Jose Washington Capitals captain Alex Ovechkin will miss Tuesday's game against San Jose. Post to Facebook Ovechkin to miss Tuesday's game vs. San Jose Washington Capitals captain Alex Ovechkin will miss Tuesday's game against San Jose.  //on.wusa9.com/1Lt5qwf   Join the Conversation To   Ovechkin to miss Tuesday's game vs. San Jose Sam C. LaPaille, WUSA9 7:12 p.m. EDT October 13, 2015 Sep 30, 2015; Raleigh, NC, USA; Washington Capitals forward Alex Ovechkin (8) looks on from the bench against the Carolina Hurricanes during the 1st period at PNC Arena. The Carolina Hurricanes defeated the Washington Capitals 4-3 in a shoot out. Mandatory Credit: James Guillory-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: James Guillory, James Guillory-USA TODAY Sports) 
WASHINGTON (WUSA9) -- The San Jose Sharks come into town Tuesday night and the Capitals will be without their star winger, Alex Ovechkin. 
Ovechkin missed Tuesday morning's skate session, with head coach Barry Trotz citing personal reasons for Ovechkin's absence. 
Ovechkin dazzled in his 2015-16 debut with a jaw-dropping goal and an assist in the season opener against the New Jersey Devils last Saturday night. 
Like us on Facebook !
